description: We set up hidden cameras in a private home and hired Timmy, an actor, to play an innocent student. He's been chatting online with Brenn Wyson, a sexual predator. They decide to meet and we are waiting for the perv to show up. Brenn is a married soldier based in San Diego. He's driving eight hours to San Francisco to meet Timmy, bringing toys, condoms and lube. Extremely nervous and cautious, Brenn finally shows up and the entire police department pounces on him as the curious neighbors watch. Are they going to take him downtown and book him? No, it's not that kind of show. All the cops take the law in their own hands and teach this perv a lesson. After they give him a good beating, they shove their cocks into Brenn's mouth and hole. Brenn begs for mercy but they keep on going until they blow their hot loads all over his face. To add insult to injury, they kick him out into the street completely naked.
title: Perverted Punishment - Brenn Wyson
